TopicTitle: ADTP-2-3 (Fueled adapter) is Incorrectly Described as Small to Medium.

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.1.4 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Windows 11 Pro 64-bit (10.0, Build 22621) | CPU: 11th Gen Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-11800H @ 2.30GHz (16 CPUs), ~2.3GHz | GPU: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3050 Laptop GPU | RAM: 16GB

 

Self explanatory, it should be Medium to Large adaptor but it's Small to Medium adaptor. There are probably more of these wrong labels since it is kind of hard to spot these so I'd recommend checking the rest just in case.

Severity: Low

Frequency: Low
